name: play-media-serialization
description: Serialization of Content Hub ONE content types and content items for the PLAY! Media project

scripts.pull:types: cd items && ch-one-cli ser pull content-type -i Sport && ch-one-cli ser pull content-type -i Athlete && ch-one-cli ser pull content-type -i Event
scripts.pull:additional-types: cd items && ch-one-cli ser pull content-type -i ContentBlock && ch-one-cli ser pull content-type -i Location
scripts.push:types: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-type -i Sport && ch-one-cli ser push content-type -i Athlete && ch-one-cli ser push content-type -i Event
scripts.push:additional-types: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-type -i ContentBlock && ch-one-cli ser push content-type -i Location
scripts.pull:media: cd items && ch-one-cli serialization pull media
scripts.pull:items: cd items && ch-one-cli ser pull content-item -c Sport && ch-one-cli ser pull content-item -c Athlete && ch-one-cli ser pull content-item -c Event
scripts.pull:additional-items: cd items && ch-one-cli ser pull content-item -c ContentBlock && ch-one-cli ser pull content-item -c Location
scripts.push:items: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c Sport && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c Athlete && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c Event
scripts.push:additional-items: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c ContentBlock && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c Location
scripts.publish:item: cd items && ch-one-cli delivery content publish
scripts.publish:media: cd items && ch-one-cli delivery media publish

author: Sitecore Demo Solutions team
